definition: وسد II to put under s.o.’s (ه) head (هـ pillow), rest, lay (هـ ه s.o.’s head on), bed (هـ ه s.o. on) │ وسده التراب (turāba) to lay s.o. or s.th. to rest in the ground; وسده صدره (ṣadrahū) to take s.o. to one’s breast, hug s.o. V to lay one’s head on a pillow (هـ); to rest or recline on a pillow or cushion (هـ)
